basics.name: Almas Baktubayev
basics.label: Chief Technology Officer / Technical Lead / Senior Backend Developer
basics.summary: Seasoned technology leader and backend architect with 7+ years of experience transforming complex business challenges into scalable technical solutions. Expert in Python/Django ecosystem, microservices architecture, and DevOps practices. Proven track record of building and leading high-performing engineering teams, driving digital transformation initiatives, and delivering enterprise-grade solutions. Passionate about system integration, automation, and leveraging cutting-edge technologies to create measurable business impact.

work.name: My Startups
work.summary: Leading technology strategy and execution for multiple startup ventures, focusing on innovative solutions and rapid market deployment.
highlights: Defining technology vision and architecture for new venture initiatives
Building scalable technical foundations from ground zero
Establishing engineering best practices and development workflows
Driving innovation through emerging technologies and modern development practices

work.name: MyCar Group
work.summary: Led technical transformation initiatives and engineering team for a major automotive technology company, focusing on enterprise system integration and business process automation.
highlights: Architected and implemented comprehensive system integration solutions across 15+ enterprise systems
Led a cross-functional team of 8+ engineers in delivering mission-critical business automation projects
Reduced operational overhead by 40% through intelligent process automation and workflow optimization
Established CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices, improving deployment frequency by 300%
Provided strategic IT consulting to C-level executives on digital transformation initiatives
Mentored junior developers and conducted technical workshops to elevate team capabilities
Designed and deployed microservices architecture using Django, FastAPI, Docker, and Kubernetes

work.name: MyCar Group
work.summary: Developed robust backend solutions for automotive business processes and system integrations.
highlights: Built RESTful APIs and GraphQL endpoints serving 50,000+ daily requests
Implemented complex business logic for inventory management and sales automation
Optimized database queries reducing response times by 60%
Integrated third-party services and payment gateways
Contributed to architectural decisions and technical documentation
